Diagnosis
	1. Prostate adenocarcinoma, right zone
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Transrectal ultrasound guided biopsy

	Radiotherapy
	Commenced external beam radiotherapy 15 Mar 2024, due to complete 26 Apr 2024

	Hormone therapy
	Leuprorelin 3-monthly depot commenced 01 Feb 2024

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	Responding to treatment

	Current issues
	Mild fatigue, Grade 1 radiation proctitis

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today during week 4 of radical radiotherapy. Tolerating treatment well with only mild fatigue and grade 1 radiation proctitis managed with local measures. No urinary symptoms. Performance status remains 0.

Latest PSA has fallen appropriately to 0.8 ng/mL from pre-treatment level of 6.7 ng/mL. Testosterone confirmed at castrate level.

On examination, no concerning features. Digital rectal examination deferred during radiotherapy.

	Further investigations
	PSA and testosterone check in 6 weeks

	Medication prescribed
	Continue Leuprorelin 3-monthly depot

	Follow up
	Review in radiotherapy clinic in 2 weeks
Urology follow-up arranged for 3 months

	Required GP actions
	Please monitor renal function and bone health during hormone therapy
